Select directory window.English: Select directory containing BA2 files to be patched...

Permission Error.English: You lack the permissions to modify

Unexpected version.English: does not have the expected version of either 7 or 8. The file will not be patched.

No patch needed.English: is already version 1. The file will not be patched.

No archives patched.English: did not contain any archives that required patching.
